description:
Welcome to the Disaster Prevention Center!
Thank you very much for visiting us today.

Today, you will participate in a disaster drill simulating a ‘zombie disaster’ and learn how to handle a typical zombie disaster.
Follow my guidance and let's aim to become zombie disaster prevention experts!

[Simple controls mean anyone can participate!]
This disaster drill is a click-based adventure game variety show.
No complex controls needed. Feel free to join in!

【Practice disaster response in various scenarios!】
At school, at the hospital, at the shopping mall!
Protect yourself from zombies in all kinds of settings.

【Survive zombies using everyday items!】
With a broom, a trash can, a wheelchair!?
How you use the tools you grab is key.
Use everyday items to deal with zombies.

【Aim for the Zombie Disaster Prevention Mastery License!】
Through this disaster drill, we ask you to seriously confront the ‘zombie disaster’.
Progressing through the challenges increases your disaster manuals and deepens your zombie disaster knowledge.
Enhance your disaster preparedness for the zombie disaster that will one day occur!

Note
This work supports English and Japanese only.
